TopicTitle: Vespyr AtomIXX Light Body VTOL Shuttle

Articles.Content:
Here's a nice little hover transport for low gravity airless bodies. I'm very pleased with the aesthetics and functionality of it. It contains all 4 sensors and works well on the MÃƒÂ¼n, Minmus, Ike and other lighter bodies. Gets about 30 mins on the Mun and 2 hours on Minmus. Engines can rotate to speed up or slow down the craft. There is also a supplemental RCS system for additional flight control.

It also works well with Mechjeb's Translatron, just make sure to set control to the probe core on top if you do this.

Check the description in-game to see the VTOL and other controls.

Mods needed:

Infernal Robotics

B9 Aerospace (just for omni-lights)

RLA-MMRTG

KSPX

TweakScale

Rover RollKage (make sure to get all the pieces. Check later posts.)

KerbPaint (optional)

Download: Vespyr AtomIXX

Imagur Album

note: the pics have some other mods featured like Hullcam VDS that I removed before uploading to make installation easier.

Edited August 3, 2014 by desepticon
Hmm, very.... Eagle 1999-esk, am I correct in how you got inspired, or what?
Actually I was inspired by a post on the RollKage thread that I can't seem to find now. Though I do now see the resemblance!
Also, if you wanted your name to be Decepticon, it's an C not an S, but if you wanted it to be with an S, fine with me. doesn't sound different to me.
Its with an "s" because thats my AOL name from ages ago (damn "c" was taken), my current email addresses use this too.
